message: Shouting, I catch the attention of the guys about to attack Koujaku from behind.
As two of them charge me, I knock one of them out with a roundhouse kick. I then close with the other guy and punch him in the gut.

name: 紅雀
message: "And hey! Aren't these guys with Dry Juice?!"
So I was right. Koujaku noticed it too.
